item.title: 消息称苹果将跟进 LOFIC 相机技术
item.guid: 消息称苹果将跟进-LOFIC-相机技术
item.description:
South Korean source "yeux1122" recently posted on a blog that Apple plans to introduce LOFIC (Low Noise, High Dynamic Range) camera technology in its next-generation flagship models. 韩国消息源「yeux1122」近日在博客发布帖文称，苹果计划在新一代旗舰机型中引入 LOFIC（Low Noise, High Dynamic Range，低噪声、高动态范围）相机技术。

This technology is considered the next-generation high dynamic range imaging solution after multi-frame HDR and DCG/DXG. It can effectively solve "ghosting" and "halo" issues in traditional HDR paths and provide higher dynamic range performance. 该技术被视为继多帧 HDR 与 DCG/DXG 之后的下一代高动态影像解决方案，能够有效解决传统 HDR 路径中的「鬼影」与「光晕」问题，并提供更高的动态范围表现。

Previously, LOFIC technology has been featured in the Honor Magic 6 series and Xiaomi 17 Pro series. It is reported that Huawei's upcoming flagship models will also adopt this technology, with relevant models equipped with Sony's latest sensors LYT-838 and LYT-910. 此前，LOFIC 技术已搭载于荣耀 Magic 6 系列和小米 17 Pro 系列，消息称，华为即将发布的旗舰机型也将采用此项技术，相关机型将搭载索尼最新传感器 LYT-838 与 LYT-910。

Meanwhile, OPPO and vivo are also actively advancing the research and development of this technology, expected to be applied in their flagship products next year. 与此同时，OPPO 与 vivo 也在积极推进该技术的研发，预计将在下一年度的旗舰产品中应用。

Apple, on the other hand, plans to introduce LOFIC technology into its self-developed CMOS sensors, with the timeline set for after 2027. Samsung has not yet announced a clear technology roadmap. 苹果方面则计划在自研 CMOS 传感器中引入 LOFIC 技术，时间节点定在 2027 年之后。而三星目前尚未公布明确的技术路线图。

item.title: OpenAI 宣布公司完成重组，内部路线图曝光
item.guid: OpenAI-宣布公司完成重组，内部路线图曝光
item.description:
Last night, OpenAI announced that the company has completed its restructuring, and the non-profit arm has been renamed the OpenAI Foundation, holding shares in the for-profit entity currently valued at approximately $130 billion, making it one of the most well-resourced philanthropic organizations in history. 昨晚 OpenAI 宣布公司完成重组，并且非营利机构部分现更名为 OpenAI 基金会，持有目前估值约 1300 亿美元的营利性实体股份，使其成为历史上资源最雄厚的慈善机构之一。

OpenAI stated that the foundation will initially focus on two areas (health and disease treatment, and technological solutions for AI resilience), committing to invest $25 billion. OpenAI 方面表示，基金会最初将专注于两个领域（健康与疾病治疗、针对人工智能弹性的技术解决方案），承诺投入 250 亿美元。

Subsequently, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and OpenAI Chief Scientist Jakub Pachocki held a live broadcast, revealing OpenAI's internal timeline for achieving superintelligence, AGI, and other technologies. 随后，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 和 OpenAI 首席科学家 Jakub Pachocki 进行直播，公开了 OpenAI 内部对实现超级智能、AGI 等技术的具体时间表。

Regarding AGI, Jakub believes that the arrival of AGI will be a transitional process lasting several years, not a single point in time. OpenAI is currently developing a personalized AGI. AGI 方面，Jakub 认为 AGI 的到来会是一个持续数年的过渡过程，并非一个单一的时间点。而 OpenAI 目前正在开发一个个人化的 AGI。

From OpenAI's perspective, it must build a powerful and easy-to-use platform so that AI capabilities can be widely applied, and therefore it also plans to launch AI hardware devices in the coming years. OpenAI 看来，必须打造一个强大且易于使用的平台，让 AI 的能力可以被广泛应用，因此其还计划在未来几年内推出 AI 硬件设备。

To achieve this goal, OpenAI will focus on three aspects: "Research," "Product," and "Infrastructure." 针对这一目标，OpenAI 将以「研究（Research）、产品（Product）、基础设施（Infrastructure）」三方面展开。

Among these, OpenAI has set a goal to develop an AI research intern with sufficient capabilities by September next year. For a more distant goal, it aims to develop a fully automated AI researcher capable of independently completing large research projects by March 2028. 其中，OpenAI 定下目标，将会在明年九月之前，开发出能力足够强的 AI 研究实习生。而对于更远的目标，则是在 2028 年 3 月前，开发出一个能够自主完成大型研究项目、实现完全自动化的 AI 研究员。

At the same time, OpenAI internally believes that deep learning systems may be less than a decade away from achieving super intelligence—that is, systems smarter than all humans across many key dimensions. 同时，OpenAI 内部相信，深度学习系统距离实现超级智能（super intelligence）——即在众多关键维度上比所有人类都更聪明的系统——可能已不足十年。

Furthermore, OpenAI did not provide a specific release date for GPT-6, and both individuals stated that the pace of product releases will no longer be strictly tied to research plans. It is worth noting that model capabilities may see a significant leap within the next six months. 另外，对于 GPT-6 的发布时间，OpenAI 并未给出具体时间，两人也表示产品发布的节奏将不再与研究计划严格绑定。值得一提的是，未来六个月内模型能力或会有巨大飞跃。

item.title: 英伟达发布下一代超级芯片，性能提升超 3 倍
item.guid: 英伟达发布下一代超级芯片，性能提升超-3-倍
item.description:
Early this morning, NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang publicly showcased its next-generation Vera Rubin Superchip for the first time at the GTC October 2025 conference. 今天凌晨，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋在 GTC October 2025 大会上，首次公开展示了其下一代 Vera Rubin 超级芯片（Superchip）。

According to reports, the Vera Rubin motherboard integrates one Vera CPU and two massive Rubin GPUs, equipped with up to 32 LPDDR memory slots, while the GPUs will also utilize HBM4 high-bandwidth memory. 据介绍， Vera Rubin 的主板整合了一颗 Vera CPU 与两颗巨大的 Rubin GPU，并配备了最多 32 个 LPDDR 内存插槽，同时 GPU 上还将采用 HBM4 高带宽显存。

Huang Renxun stated that the Rubin GPU has returned to the lab for testing, and these are the first samples manufactured by TSMC. 黄仁勋表示，Rubin GPU 已经回到实验室进行测试，这是由台积电代工生产的首批样品。

Specifically, each GPU features 8 HBM4 interfaces and two reticle-sized GPU core dies. Additionally, the Vera CPU is equipped with 88 custom Arm architecture cores, supporting up to 176 threads. 具体来看，每颗 GPU 拥有 8 个 HBM4 接口及两颗与光罩大小相同的 GPU 核心芯片（Reticle-sized dies）。此外，Vera CPU 搭载 88 个定制 Arm 架构核心，最高可支持 176 线程。

According to NVIDIA's plan, the Rubin GPU is expected to enter mass production in the third or fourth quarter of 2026, roughly coinciding with or even earlier than the full mass production of the existing Blackwell Ultra "GB300" Superchip platform. 按照英伟达的规划，Rubin GPU 有望在 2026 年第三或第四季度进入量产阶段，时间大致与现有的 Blackwell Ultra「GB300」Superchip 平台全面量产相当或更早。

NVIDIA's Vera Rubin NVL144 platform will utilize a combination of two new chips, where the Rubin GPU consists of two reticle-sized cores, offering 50 PFLOPS (FP4 precision) of computing power and equipped with 288 GB of HBM4 memory. The accompanying Vera CPU provides 88 custom Arm cores and 176 threads, with NVLINK-C2C interconnect bandwidth reaching 1.8 TB/s. 而英伟达的 Vera Rubin NVL144 平台将采用两颗新芯片组合，其中 Rubin GPU 由两颗 Reticle 尺寸的核心组成，具备 50 PFLOPS（FP4 精度） 的算力，并配备 288 GB HBM4 显存。配套的 Vera CPU 提供 88 个定制 Arm 核心、176 线程，NVLINK-C2C 互联带宽可达 1.8 TB/s。

In terms of performance, the Vera Rubin NVL144 platform can achieve 3.6 Exaflops (FP4 inference) and 1.2 Exaflops (FP8 training) of computing power, an increase of approximately 3.3 times compared to the GB300 NVL72; the total system memory bandwidth reaches 13 TB/s, and fast storage capacity is 75 TB, representing a 60% increase over the previous generation, and it features double NVLINK and CX9 communication capabilities, with maximum speeds of 260 TB/s and 28.8 TB/s respectively. 性能方面，Vera Rubin NVL144 平台可实现 3.6 Exaflops（FP4 推理） 与 1.2 Exaflops（FP8 训练） 的算力，相较 GB300 NVL72 提升约 3.3 倍；系统总显存带宽达 13 TB/s，快速存储容量为 75 TB，分别比上一代提升 60%，并具备双倍 NVLINK 与 CX9 通信能力，最高速率分别为 260 TB/s 与 28.8 TB/s。

Additionally, NVIDIA plans to launch the more advanced Rubin Ultra NVL576 platform in the second half of 2027. This platform can achieve 15 Exaflops (FP4 inference) and 5 Exaflops (FP8 training) of computing power, a 14-fold increase compared to the GB300 NVL72. 另外，英伟达还计划在 2027 年下半年 推出更高端的 Rubin Ultra NVL576 平台。该平台可实现 15 Exaflops（FP4 推理） 与 5 Exaflops（FP8 训练） 算力，相较 GB300 NVL72 提升 14 倍。

At the conference, Jensen Huang also offered a profound insight into AI: 会上，黄仁勋还提出了一个对于 AI 的深刻洞察：

In the past, the software industry was essentially "creating tools"; Excel, Word, and browsers are all tools. In the IT field, these tools might be "databases" or similar, with a market size of approximately one trillion US dollars.

But AI is not a tool; it is a "worker." In fact, AI is a "worker who uses tools." This is the fundamental difference.

item.title: 三星三折叠实机曝光，「折痕几乎看不到」
item.guid: 三星三折叠实机曝光，「折痕几乎看不到」
item.description:
According to Weibo blogger "i Ice Universe," Samsung's first tri-fold phone, the Galaxy Z TriFold, was publicly showcased for the first time as a physical device yesterday at the K-Tech Showcase exhibition in South Korea. 据微博博主「i 冰宇宙」消息，三星首款三折叠屏手机 Galaxy Z TriFold 已于昨天在韩国 K-Tech Showcase 展会上首次以实机形式公开展出。

The video released by the blogger shows two devices on display at the scene, one in a folded state and one in an unfolded state, both placed inside glass cases for viewers to observe. 该博主发布的视频显示，现场展示了两台设备，分别处于折叠与展开状态，均被置于玻璃罩内供观众观赏。

This new phone features a "G-type" dual-inward folding design. When fully unfolded, the screen size is nearly 10 inches, and in the folded state, the outer screen is approximately 6.5 inches. The inner screen does not use an under-display camera, and the crease control performance is outstanding, making it almost invisible. 这款新机采用「G 型」双内折设计，完全展开后屏幕尺寸接近 10 英寸，折叠状态下外屏约为 6.5 英寸。内屏未使用屏下摄像头，折痕控制表现突出，几乎不可见。

Patent information shows that the device is equipped with three independent batteries, distributed in different folding modules, to optimize battery life performance. 专利信息显示，该机搭载三块独立电池，分布在不同折叠模块，以优化续航表现。

In terms of performance, the Galaxy Z TriFold is expected to be equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, support 100x digital zoom, and feature upgraded reverse charging. The hinge adopts a multi-track structure, and laboratory tests show it can withstand over 600,000 folds. 在性能方面，Galaxy Z TriFold 预计搭载高通骁龙 8 至尊版处理器，支持 100 倍数码变焦，并具备升级后的反向充电功能。铰链采用多轨结构，实验室测试显示可承受超过 60 万次折叠。

Industry sources say the device will officially debut this week at the APEC CEO Summit in Gyeongju, South Korea, with sales planned to begin in early November. 业内消息称，该机将在本周于韩国庆州举行的 APEC CEO 峰会上正式亮相，并计划于 11 月初开售。

The first batch of Galaxy Z TriFold shipments is approximately 50,000 units, with an estimated price as high as 4 million Korean Won (approximately 19,800 RMB), significantly higher than Samsung's existing foldable flagship models. Galaxy Z TriFold 首批出货量约为 5 万台，售价预计高达 400 万韩元（约合 19800 元人民币），远高于三星现有折叠屏旗舰机型。

The product will first be launched in China, South Korea, Singapore, and some Middle Eastern markets, with North American and European markets not included in the initial launch. 该产品将率先在中国、韩国、新加坡及部分中东市场上市，北美和欧洲市场暂不在首发范围内。

item.title: 雷军领衔成立小米汽车架构部，强化前瞻研发布局
item.guid: 雷军领衔成立小米汽车架构部，强化前瞻研发布局
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Xiaomi Auto announced an organizational structure adjustment yesterday, establishing a new first-level department, the "Architecture Department," led personally by founder and CEO Lei Jun, directly responsible for setting the strategic direction of the next-generation technical architecture for intelligent electric vehicles. 据 36 氪报道，小米汽车昨日宣布进行组织架构调整，成立全新一级部门「架构部」，由创始人、CEO 雷军亲自带队，直接负责智能电动汽车下一代技术架构的战略定调。

Sources say the department's members include several R&D heads and core personnel. Cui Qiang, the head of vehicle R&D, has been transferred to the Architecture Department, and Wang Zhensuo, the former head of electric power, has taken over vehicle R&D. 消息称，该部门成员包括多位研发负责人及核心骨干，整车研发负责人崔强已调入架构部，原电动力负责人王振锁接任整车研发工作。

Industry insiders point out that the technical direction for automotive platforms usually needs to be finalized 5 to 8 years in advance, directly determining the competitiveness and market performance of future generations of products. Xiaomi's move to elevate forward-looking research to a first-level department demonstrates its intention to strengthen strategic technological foresight amidst intensifying competition in electrification and intelligentization. 业内人士指出，汽车平台的技术定调通常需提前 5 至 8 年完成，直接决定未来数代产品的竞争力与市场表现。小米此次将前瞻性研究提升至一级部门，显示其在电动化与智能化竞争加剧背景下，强化技术战略预判的意图。

Currently, the electric vehicle industry faces uncertainties with multiple technical routes coexisting in areas such as batteries, supercharging, solid-state batteries, and steer-by-wire chassis. Xiaomi hopes to clarify investment directions and find new growth points through the Architecture Department's cutting-edge exploration. 目前，电动汽车行业在电池、超充、固态电池及线控底盘等方向均存在多条技术路线并行的不确定性。小米希望通过架构部的前沿探索，明确投入方向，寻找新的增长点。

Since the launch of its first model in 2024, the cumulative sales of the Xiaomi SU7 series have exceeded 258,000 units. The YU7 delivered over 40,000 units in its first three months on the market, and the SU7 Ultra, starting at 529,900 yuan, has secured over 23,000 locked orders. With sales growth, Xiaomi's automotive business is also expected to achieve quarterly profitability this year. 自 2024 年推出首款车型以来，小米 SU7 系列累计销量已突破 25.8 万辆，YU7 上市三个月交付超 4 万辆，售价 52.99 万元起的 SU7 Ultra 锁单量超过 2.3 万辆。随着销量增长，小米汽车业务也有望在今年实现单季度盈利。

Additionally, Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, posted yesterday that Xiaomi's first major home appliance factory — the "Xiaomi Smart Home Appliance Factory" — has officially been completed and put into operation in Hubei. 另外，小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰昨日发文称，小米首座大家电工厂 ——「小米智能家电工厂」在湖北正式竣工并投产。

Lu Weibing stated that Xiaomi's major home appliance business aims to reach a scale of 100 billion yuan in the next five years, with the goal of joining the ranks of top domestic home appliance brands by 2030. 卢伟冰表示，小米未来五年大家电业务将冲刺千亿规模，目标在 2030 年跻身国内头部家电品牌阵营。

According to reports, this is Xiaomi's third large-scale smart factory, following the "Xiaomi Smartphone Smart Factory" and "Xiaomi Auto Factory," marking the achievement of a complete industrial closed-loop of "design - R&D - production - verification" in its major home appliance business. 据介绍，这是继「小米手机智能工厂」和「小米汽车工厂」之后，小米布局的第三座大型智能工厂，标志着其在大家电业务上实现了「设计 — 研发 — 生产 — 验证」的完整产业闭环。

The factory is positioned as a new-generation smart factory, emphasizing both efficiency and quality. Lu Weibing stated that the production line can roll out a high-end air conditioner in 6.5 seconds, with 100% AI visual quality inspection for key components, and overall efficiency and quality have reached industry-leading levels. 该工厂定位为新一代智能工厂，强调效率与质量并重。卢伟冰表示，生产线可在 6.5 秒下线一台高端空调，关键部件实现 100% AI 视觉质检，整体效率与质量已达到行业领先水准。

item.title: 马斯克版百科 Grokipedia 初版上线，被曝大规模复制维基百科内容
item.guid: 马斯克版百科-Grokipedia-初版上线，被曝大规模复制维基百科内容
item.description:
According to The Verge, some content in xAI's recently launched online encyclopedia "Grokipedia" has been accused of being directly copied from Wikipedia. 据 The Verge 报道，xAI 日前推出的在线百科全书「Grokipedia」部分内容被指直接复制自维基百科。

Grokipedia's page design is highly similar to Wikipedia's, with the homepage centered around a search bar, and entries including titles, subtitles, and citations. Grokipedia 的页面设计与维基百科高度相似，首页以搜索栏为核心，条目包含标题、子标题和引用。

However, unlike Wikipedia's open editing mechanism, Grokipedia currently does not allow users to freely edit. An "Edit" button is only displayed on some pages, and clicking it only allows viewing completed changes, not submitting new suggestions. 然而，与维基百科的开放编辑机制不同，Grokipedia 目前并未向用户开放自由编辑，仅在部分页面显示「编辑」按钮，且点击后只能查看已完成的修改，无法提交新建议。

It is worth noting that some entries are marked at the bottom of the page with "Content adapted from Wikipedia, under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 license." 值得注意的是，部分条目在页面底部标注「内容改编自维基百科，遵循 Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 协议」。

Pages for entries such as MacBook Air, PlayStation 5, and Lincoln Mark VIII are almost identical to the original Wikipedia text, showing word-for-word copy-pasting . In response, a spokesperson for the Wikimedia Foundation stated: "Even Grokipedia needs Wikipedia to exist." MacBook Air、PlayStation 5 和 Lincoln Mark VIII 等词条的页面几乎与维基百科原文一致， 呈现逐字逐句的复制粘贴 。对此，维基百科基金会发言人表示：「即便是 Grokipedia 也需要维基百科的存在。」

However, Grokipedia's descriptions on some topics differ from Wikipedia's. 不过，Grokipedia 在部分议题上的表述与维基百科存在差异。

Taking the climate change entry as an example, Wikipedia emphasizes that "the scientific community almost unanimously agrees that climate warming is caused by human activities," while Grokipedia downplays this "unanimity" and includes criticism of media and environmental organizations for "exaggerating public concerns." 以气候变化条目为例，维基百科强调「科学界几乎 一致认为 气候变暖由人类活动引起」，而 Grokipedia 方面则淡化了「一致性」，并加入了对媒体和环保组织「夸大公众担忧」的批评。

Currently, Grokipedia's homepage shows that it has collected over 885,000 articles, while the total number of English entries on Wikipedia is approximately 7 million. 目前，Grokipedia 首页显示其已收录超过 88.5 万篇文章，而维基百科英文条目总数约为 700 万。

Grokipedia is still in its v0.1 stage, and xAI founder Elon Musk previously promised to resolve content overlap issues with Wikipedia within the year. Grokipedia 仍处于 v0.1 版本阶段，xAI 创始人 Elon Musk 此前曾承诺将在年内解决与维基百科内容重叠的问题。

🔗 Related reading: Musk's AI encyclopedia Grokipedia crashed upon release: caught copying Wikipedia and inserting private content? 🔗 相关阅读：马斯克的 AI 百科 Grokipedia 刚发布就翻车：抄维基百科被抓现行，还夹带私货？

item.title: OpenAI：每周逾百万 ChatGPT 用户谈及自杀
item.guid: OpenAI：每周逾百万-ChatGPT-用户谈及自杀
item.description:
OpenAI recently released new data showing that over 1 million ChatGPT users per week engage in conversations involving suicide-related content. OpenAI 于近日公布最新数据，显示每周约有超过 100 万名 ChatGPT 用户在对话中涉及自杀相关内容。

The company states that among its 800 million weekly active users, approximately 0.15% of conversations contain "clear signs of potential suicide plans or intentions." Additionally, hundreds of thousands of users exhibit symptoms of psychosis or mania, as well as a high degree of emotional dependence on ChatGPT, in their conversations. 公司称，在每周活跃的 8 亿用户中，约有 0.15% 的对话包含「明确的潜在自杀计划或意图」迹象。此外，还有数十万用户在对话中表现出精神病或躁狂症状，以及对 ChatGPT 的高度情感依赖。

OpenAI announced that it has recently collaborated with over 170 mental health experts from 60 countries to optimize the model's responses to mental health issues. OpenAI 表示，近期已与来自 60 个国家的 170 多名心理健康专家合作，优化了模型在应对心理健康问题时的反应。

OpenAI claims that the latest version, GPT-5, achieved a compliance rate of 91% in tests involving suicide-related conversations, a significant improvement from the previous version's 77%. OpenAI 称，最新版本 GPT-5 在涉及自杀相关对话的测试中，合规率达到 91%，较此前版本的 77% 有显著提升。

TechCrunch reported that OpenAI has incorporated "emotional dependence" and "non-suicidal mental health emergencies" into its model safety benchmarks, and has launched parental control features and a child user identification system to strengthen protective measures. TechCrunch 报道指出，OpenAI 已将「情感依赖」和「非自杀性心理健康紧急情况」纳入模型安全基准测试，并推出家长控制功能与儿童用户识别系统，以强化保护措施。

However, external doubts about its long-term effectiveness persist. Meanwhile, OpenAI also faces legal and regulatory pressure, including warnings from the Attorneys General of California and Delaware, and a lawsuit involving underage users. 然而，外界仍对其长期效果存疑。与此同时，OpenAI 还面临法律与监管压力，包括加州和特拉华州总检察长的警告，以及一起涉及未成年用户的诉讼案件。

item.title: 大疆运动相机全球市占近七成，全景相机近半
item.guid: 大疆运动相机全球市占近七成，全景相机近半
item.description:
Recently, the management consulting firm JQ Consulting released a global panoramic and action camera market research report. 日前，管理咨询机构久谦咨询发布全球全景及运动相机市场研究报告。

The report indicates that as of Q3 2025, DJI's revenue in the action camera sector has reached 66% of the global market share, replacing GoPro as the global leader with an absolute advantage. 报告指出，截至 2025 年 Q3，大疆在运动相机领域的收入占全球市场份额已达 66%，以绝对优势取代 GoPro 成为全球第一。

At the same time, DJI's first panoramic camera, the Osmo 360, launched on July 31st, achieved a 49% market share in Chinese e-commerce channels and a 43% global market share within less than 3 months of its launch, rapidly reshaping the panoramic camera market landscape. 与此同时，大疆于 7 月 31 日推出的首款全景相机 Osmo 360，在上市不到 3 个月的时间内，分别在中国电商渠道获得 49% 的市场份额，全球市场份额达到 43%，迅速推动全景相机市场格局重塑。

Meanwhile, the American brand GoPro, which long dominated the action camera sector, has seen its global market share drop from over 75% in 2022-23 to 18% in 2025. Insta360 currently holds about 13% of the action camera market. 而曾经在运动相机领域长期占据主导的美国品牌 GoPro，其全球市场份额已从 2022-23 年的 75% 以上下降至 2025 年的 18%。影石 Insta360 目前在运动相机市场则占约 13%。

item.title: 机构：百度 AI 搜索连续三季登顶，移动端 AI 应用月活突破 7 亿
item.guid: 机构：百度-AI-搜索连续三季登顶，移动端-AI-应用月活突破-7-亿
item.description:
Yesterday, the internet big data analysis platform QuestMobile released its Q3 2025 AI application industry report. 昨天，互联网大数据分析平台 QuestMobile 发布 2025 年三季度 AI 应用行业报告。

The report indicates that in Q3, China's AI application market continued to expand, with mobile monthly active users exceeding 729 million and PC users reaching 200 million. Among these, Baidu AI Search ranked first in domestic AI search applications for three consecutive quarters with 382 million monthly active users. 报告指出，三季度中国 AI 应用市场规模持续扩大，移动端月活跃用户突破 7.29 亿，PC 端用户达到 2 亿。 其中，百度 AI 搜索凭借 3.82 亿月活跃用户连续三个季度位居国内 AI 搜索应用榜首。

Data shows that the three major mobile forms — native Apps, In-App plugins, and mobile phone manufacturer AI assistants — had user scales of 287 million, 706 million, and 535 million respectively, maintaining an overall growth trend. 数据显示，移动端三大形态 —— 原生 App、In-App 插件及手机厂商 AI 助手用户规模分别为 2.87 亿、7.06 亿和 5.35 亿，整体保持增长趋势。

Among them, the In-App plugin model has become the main driver of industry growth, accounting for over 60% of the top 50 AI applications by monthly active users in September 2025. 其中，In-App 插件模式已成为行业增长主力，在 2025 年 9 月月活跃用户规模 TOP50 的 AI 应用中，占比超过六成。

In terms of user behavior, the average monthly usage time for native Apps from internet/AI technology companies reached 117.7 minutes, significantly higher than In-App plugins (31 minutes) and mobile phone manufacturer AI assistants (5.3 minutes). 在用户行为方面，互联网/AI 科技企业原生 App 的月人均使用时长达到 117.7 分钟，显著高于 In-App 插件（31 分钟）和手机厂商 AI 助手（5.3 分钟）。

In addition, vertical applications performed exceptionally well. For example, Ant Group's health consultant AQ App achieved nearly double growth in the third quarter, with its monthly active user base reaching 7.85 million. 此外，垂直领域应用表现突出，如蚂蚁集团旗下健康顾问 AQ App 在三季度实现近乎翻倍的增长，月活跃用户规模达到 785 万。

item.title: 亚马逊启动最大规模裁员 3 万人，聚焦 AI 提效
item.guid: 亚马逊启动最大规模裁员-3-万人，聚焦-AI-提效
item.description:
According to Reuters, Amazon plans to initiate a new round of layoffs starting yesterday, affecting up to 30,000 corporate employees. This scale represents a very small proportion of the company's total 1.55 million employees, but it is close to 10% of its 350,000 corporate employees, making it the largest layoff action since 2022. 据路透社报道，亚马逊计划自昨天起启动新一轮裁员，涉及多达 3 万名企业员工。这一规模约占公司 155 万总员工的极小比例，但接近其 35 万企业员工的 10%，将成为自 2022 年以来最大规模的裁员行动。

Sources said this round of layoffs covers multiple departments, including Human Resources (PXT), Operations, Devices and Services, and AWS. Managers of affected teams received training the day before yesterday to communicate with employees after email notifications are sent out. 消息人士称，本轮裁员覆盖人力资源（PXT）、运营、设备与服务以及 AWS 等多个部门。受影响团队的管理人员已于前天接受培训，以便在邮件通知发出后与员工沟通。

Amazon CEO Andy Jassy is pushing to cut management layers, reduce bureaucratic processes, and improve efficiency through AI tools. He previously stated that the application of AI will further automate repetitive tasks, leading to job reductions. 亚马逊 CEO Andy Jassy 正推动削减管理层级、减少官僚流程，并通过人工智能工具提升效率。他此前表示，AI 的应用将进一步自动化重复性任务，从而带来岗位缩减。

In addition, Amazon's recently implemented mandatory return-to-office policy failed to achieve the expected staff attrition, so the company opted for layoffs to control costs. Some employees who did not clock in as required were deemed to have "voluntarily resigned" and were not eligible for severance compensation. 此外，亚马逊近期推行的强制返岗政策未能带来预期的人员流失，公司因此选择通过裁员来控制成本。部分未按要求打卡的员工被认定为「主动离职」，不享受遣散补偿。

Despite this, Amazon is still hiring 250,000 seasonal employees for the holiday shopping season, consistent with the past two years. The company's stock rose 1.2% on Monday, closing at $226.97. Additionally, Amazon plans to release its third-quarter earnings report this Thursday. 尽管如此，亚马逊仍在为假日购物季招聘 25 万名季节性员工，与过去两年持平。公司股价在周一上涨 1.2%，收于 226.97 美元。此外，亚马逊计划于本周四公布第三季度财报。

item.title: OpenAI 将为印度用户免费提供一年 ChatGPT Go 服务
item.guid: OpenAI-将为印度用户免费提供一年-ChatGPT-Go-服务
item.description:
According to The Hindu, OpenAI announced that it will launch a one-year free ChatGPT Go usage plan in India starting November 4th. This initiative coincides with OpenAI's DevDay Exchange developer event held in Bangalore, aiming to expand the adoption of AI tools in the Indian market. 据《印度报》报道，OpenAI 宣布将自 11 月 4 日起在印度推出为期一年的 ChatGPT Go 免费使用计划。该举措与 OpenAI 在班加罗尔举办的 DevDay Exchange 开发者活动同步进行，旨在扩大 AI 工具在印度市场的普及度。

OpenAI stated that existing ChatGPT Go subscribers will also receive an additional 12 months of free usage, with specific redemption methods to be announced later. OpenAI 表示，现有 ChatGPT Go 订阅用户也将获得额外 12 个月的免费使用资格，具体兑换方式将在后续公布。

ChatGPT Go is a low-cost subscription plan launched by OpenAI in August, originally priced at 399 Indian Rupees (approximately 32 RMB) per month. It offers higher conversation quotas than the free version and limited access to some in-depth research features of the latest GPT-5 model. ChatGPT Go 是 OpenAI 于 8 月推出的低价订阅方案，原价为每月 399 印度卢比（约 32 元人民币），提供比免费版更高的对话额度，并可有限度使用最新 GPT-5 模型的部分深度研究功能。

Nick Turley, OpenAI Vice President and Head of ChatGPT, stated: "Ahead of our first DevDay Exchange in India, this free plan is being launched to enable more users to easily experience advanced AI technology." OpenAI 副总裁兼 ChatGPT 负责人 Nick Turley 在声明中指出：「在我们首次于印度举办 DevDay Exchange 之前，推出这一免费计划是为了让更多用户能够便捷体验先进的 AI 技术。」

OpenAI has recently increased its investment in India, having established its first office in Delhi and recruited talent in education and sales, while also increasing advertising. OpenAI 近期在印度加大投入，已在德里设立首个办公室，并招聘教育及销售领域人才，同时加大广告投放。

OpenAI stated that this promotion is part of its "India-first" strategy and aligns with the Indian government's IndiaAI initiative. The company also revealed that it plans to build at least 1 GW capacity data centers in India in the future to support localized development. OpenAI 表示，此次推广是其「印度优先（India-first）」战略的一部分，亦与印度政府推动的 IndiaAI 计划相呼应。公司还透露，未来将在印度建设至少 1 GW 容量的数据中心，以支持本地化发展。

item.title: 初代 Pixel Watch 正式停更
item.guid: 初代-Pixel-Watch-正式停更
item.description:
According to Android Authority, Google pushed the October 2025 update to the original Pixel Watch yesterday. 据 Android Authority 报道，谷歌已于昨天向初代 Pixel Watch 推送 2025 年 10 月更新。

The version number for this update is BW1A.251005.003.W1, and it only includes a small number of security patches and bug fixes. 本次更新的版本号为 BW1A.251005.003.W1 ，仅包含少量安全补丁与漏洞修复。

It is worth noting that the first-generation Pixel Watch was released in 2022, and this is the last official update provided by Google for it, meaning the original Pixel Watch will not receive WearOS 6. 值得注意的是，一代 Pixel Watch 发布于 2022 年，本次是谷歌为其提供的最后一次官方更新，意味着初代 Pixel Watch 将无缘 WearOS 6。

Google had promised at least 3 years of software support for the Pixel Watch, and that commitment expired this month. With the release of this update, official support for the first-generation Pixel Watch officially ends. Although Google could theoretically choose to release additional security patches, the company is no longer obligated to continue updates. Google 曾承诺为 Pixel Watch 提供至少 3 年的软件支持，该承诺已于本月到期。随着此次更新的发布，首代 Pixel Watch 的官方支持周期正式结束。尽管谷歌理论上仍可选择额外发布安全补丁，但公司已不再承担继续更新的义务。

item.title: 我国科研团队实现「人造太阳」核心材料国产化
item.guid: 我国科研团队实现「人造太阳」核心材料国产化
item.description:
Yesterday, the team of Researcher Rong Lijian from the Institute of Metal Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences, achieved a key breakthrough in the localization of metal substrates for second-generation high-temperature superconducting tapes (REBCO), successfully realizing the independent preparation of core materials for the "artificial sun." This achievement marks China's breaking away from long-term reliance on imports in the field of key materials for controllable nuclear fusion. 昨天，中国科学院金属研究所戎利建研究员团队在第二代高温超导带材（REBCO）用金属基带国产化方面取得关键突破，成功实现了「人造太阳」核心材料的自主制备。这一成果标志着我国在可控核聚变关键材料领域打破长期依赖进口的局面。

The research team utilized independently developed material purification preparation technology to produce high-purity, ton-scale Hastelloy C276. The content of impurities such as carbon, manganese, sulfur, phosphorus, oxygen, and nitrogen in this alloy is lower than that of similar imported materials, with some indicators being even better. 研究团队利用自主研发的材料纯净化制备技术，制备出高纯净吨级哈氏合金 C276。该合金中碳、锰、硫、磷、氧、氮等杂质含量均低于进口同类材料，部分指标更优。

Based on this, the team overcame key processes such as forging, rolling, heat treatment, and surface quality control, successfully preparing ultra-long and ultra-thin metal substrates with a thickness of 0.046 millimeters, a width of 12 millimeters, and a length exceeding 2000 meters. Its surface roughness is less than 20 nanometers, and its tensile strength at liquid nitrogen temperature exceeds 1900 MPa. Even after heating to 900℃, it maintains a strength of over 1200 MPa, demonstrating excellent thermal stability and mechanical properties. 基于此，团队攻克了锻造、轧制、热处理及表面质量控制等关键工艺，成功制备出厚度 0.046 毫米、宽度 12 毫米、长度超过 2000 米的超长超薄金属基带。其表面粗糙度小于 20 纳米，在液氮温度下的抗拉强度超过 1900 兆帕，即便在 900℃ 高温加热后仍保持 1200 兆帕以上的强度，展现出优异的热稳定性和力学性能。

Currently, this batch-prepared substrate has been verified by Shanghai Superconductor Technology Co., Ltd. and has achieved large-scale production of nearly a thousand meters of high-temperature superconducting tape at Eastern Superconductor Technology (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. Test results show that its performance is comparable to REBCO materials prepared using imported substrates, with some indicators approaching or even reaching international advanced levels. 目前，该批量化制备的基带已在上海超导科技企业完成验证，并在东部超导科技（苏州）有限公司实现近千米高温超导带材的规模化生产。测试结果显示，其性能与采用进口基带制备的 REBCO 材料相当，部分指标接近甚至达到国际先进水平。

It is reported that the Institute of Metal Research, Chinese Academy of Sciences, has signed a framework agreement with Eastern Superconducting Technology for the supply of 20 tons of C276 substrate, and both parties will continue to deepen cooperation and promote the large-scale application of domestically produced substrate. This breakthrough provides solid support for the research and development of China's controllable nuclear fusion devices and future clean energy strategy. 据悉，中国科学院金属研究所已与东部超导科技签署 20 吨 C276 基带供货框架协议，双方将继续深化合作，推动国产化基带的规模化应用。这一突破为我国可控核聚变装置的研发和未来清洁能源战略提供了坚实支撑。

item.title: 资金达预算上限，深圳汽车置换补贴昨日正式终止
item.guid: 资金达预算上限，深圳汽车置换补贴昨日正式终止
item.description:
Yesterday, the Shenzhen Municipal Bureau of Commerce announced that Shenzhen's 2025 car replacement and upgrade subsidy policy completed its qualification distribution yesterday, and officially ceased implementation after the subsidy funds reached the budget cap. 昨天，深圳市商务局发布公告称，深圳市 2025 年汽车置换更新补贴政策已于昨天完成资格发放，补贴资金达到预算上限后正式停止实施。

According to the announcement, the relevant application platform, the "Shenzhen Car Replacement and Upgrade" WeChat mini-program, will close the subsidy application portal at 24:00 on November 30, 2025, and close the inquiry and correction portal at 24:00 on December 10. 根据公告，相关申报平台「深圳汽车置换更新」微信小程序将于 2025 年 11 月 30 日 24 时关闭补贴申报入口，并于 12 月 10 日 24 时关闭查询补正入口。

The announcement emphasizes that applicants who have obtained subsidy qualifications must complete their application submission within the specified time to ensure smooth receipt of the subsidy. This policy implementation adheres to the principle of "total amount control, first-come, first-served, and cessation upon exhaustion," aiming to promote the trade-in of consumer goods and facilitate the upgrading of the automotive market. 公告强调，已获得补贴资格的申请人需在规定时间内完成申请提交，以确保顺利领取补贴。此次政策执行遵循「总额控制、先到先得、用完即止」原则，旨在推动消费品以旧换新，促进汽车市场更新换代。

item.title: 三星将在智能冰箱上加广告
item.guid: 三星将在智能冰箱上加广告
item.description:
According to The Verge, Samsung plans to push advertisements to its Family Hub smart refrigerators in the U.S. market starting November 3. This update will be delivered via software OTA, covering models equipped with 21.5-inch and 32-inch large screens. 据 The Verge 报道，三星计划自 11 月 3 日起在美国市场的 Family Hub 智能冰箱上推送广告。此次更新将通过软件 OTA 形式下发，覆盖配备 21.5 英寸和 32 英寸大屏的机型。

Shane Higby, head of Samsung's U.S. home appliance business, stated that advertisements will appear as new widgets embedded in the refrigerator's "cover screen theme." 三星美国家电业务负责人 Shane Higby 表示，广告将以新小部件的形式出现，嵌入冰箱的「封面屏主题」中。

The widget includes four interfaces: news, calendar, weather, and "featured ads," which automatically rotate every 10 seconds. Initially, ad content will be limited to Samsung's own products and services, such as refrigerator water filters, but may expand to third-party brands. 该小部件包含新闻、日历、天气和「精选广告」四个界面，每 10 秒自动轮换。广告内容初期仅限于三星自有产品和服务，例如冰箱滤芯，但未来可能扩展至第三方品牌。

This ad update is enabled by default, and users can turn it off in the refrigerator's "Settings – Ads" option, or achieve partial control by individually blocking specific ads. It is worth noting that ads will only appear on the "Weather" and "Color" theme interfaces and will not affect "Art" or "Album" modes. 此次广告更新默认启用，用户可在冰箱的「设置 – 广告」选项中关闭，或通过单独屏蔽特定广告实现部分控制。值得注意的是，广告仅会出现在「天气」和「色彩」主题界面，不会影响「艺术」或「相册」模式。

In addition to ads, this update also brings several functional improvements, including: AI visual recognition now supports 37 new fresh ingredients and 50 packaged foods; Bixby's voice recognition capabilities are enhanced to distinguish family members; security features are upgraded with new encrypted credential synchronization and a Knox security panel. 除广告外，本次更新还带来多项功能改进，包括：AI 视觉识别新增 37 种生鲜食材和 50 种包装食品；Bixby 增强语音识别能力，可区分家庭成员身份；安全功能升级，新增加密凭证同步和 Knox 安全面板。

item.title: 💡 Waymo 高管：安全与透明将成为 Robotaxi 获得公众信任的关键
item.guid: 💡-Waymo-高管：安全与透明将成为-Robotaxi-获得公众信任的关键
item.description:
Yesterday, Tekedra Mawakana, co-CEO of Waymo, Alphabet's self-driving car company, stated at the TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 event that Robotaxi companies need to demonstrate more transparency in terms of safety to prove the reliability of their technology. 昨日，Alphabet 旗下自动驾驶汽车公司 Waymo 联席 CEO Tekedra Mawakana 在 TechCrunch Disrupt 2025 活动中表示，自动驾驶出租车（Robotaxi）企业需要在安全性方面展现更多透明度，以证明其技术的可靠性。

Mawakana pointed out that there are a limited number of companies on the market claiming to develop Robotaxi technology, but most of them have not publicly disclosed their fleet operation data. Mawakana 指出，目前市场上声称研发 Robotaxi 技术的公司数量有限，但多数企业并未公开披露车队运行数据。

I don't know who can be included on the list of making roads safer, because they haven't told us the actual situation of their fleets.

She emphasized that if companies are to deploy autonomous vehicles on roads, they must take on the responsibility of information transparency. 她强调，如果企业要在道路上部署无人驾驶车辆，就必须承担起信息透明的责任。

Data previously released by Waymo shows that its autonomous vehicles are 5 times safer overall than human drivers, and 12 times safer when it comes to pedestrian safety. Mawakana stated that if companies cannot openly and transparently demonstrate their operational status, they cannot truly earn the qualification of "making roads safer." Waymo 此前公布的数据显示，其自动驾驶车辆在整体安全性上比人类驾驶员高出 5 倍，在涉及行人安全方面则高出 12 倍。Mawakana 表示，若企业无法公开透明地展示运营情况，就无法真正赢得「让道路更安全」的资格。

Currently, companies such as Tesla, Zoox, May Mobility, and Pony AI are all advancing Robotaxi projects at different stages in the U.S. market. 目前，美国市场上包括特斯拉、Zoox、May Mobility、Pony AI 等公司均在不同阶段推进 Robotaxi 项目。

Among them, Tesla has only released quarterly safety reports based on Autopilot but has not yet disclosed data related to its Robotaxi pilot project in Austin. Zoox has just launched trial operations in Las Vegas based on dedicated autonomous vehicles. 其中，特斯拉仅发布了基于 Autopilot 的季度安全报告，但尚未披露其在奥斯汀试点 Robotaxi 项目的相关数据。Zoox 则刚刚在拉斯维加斯启动基于专用自动驾驶车辆的试运营。

Mawakana emphasized that as the industry scales up, safety and transparency will become key to whether Robotaxi companies can gain public trust. Mawakana 强调，随着行业规模化推进，安全与透明将成为 Robotaxi 企业能否获得公众信任的关键。

item.title: 25.99 万元起，阿维塔 12 四激光版上市
item.guid: 25.99-万元起，阿维塔-12-四激光版上市
item.description:
Yesterday in Chongqing, Avatr Technology announced the official launch of the Avatr 12 Four-Laser Edition. The new car offers two power forms, pure electric and extended-range, with a total of 6 model versions. The official guide price range is 269,900 to 429,900 yuan, and the price after benefits is 259,900 to 419,900 yuan. 昨天在重庆，阿维塔科技宣布阿维塔 12 四激光版正式上市。新车提供纯电与增程两种动力形式，共 6 个车型版本，官方指导价区间为 26.99 万元至 42.99 万元，权益后售价为 25.99 万元至 41.99 万元。

Key highlights of the new car include: 新车主要亮点包括：

    Standard across all models: Huawei's four-laser radar system (3 long-range + 1 rear solid-state), equipped with Huawei Qiankun ADS 4 intelligent driving assistance system and all-dimensional anti-collision system CAS 4.0;

    HarmonySpace 5 cockpit, supports multi-screen interaction and audio-visual entertainment;

    The pure electric version is equipped with a 94kWh battery, with a CLTC range of 755km for the RWD version, and 0-100km/h acceleration in 3.8 seconds for the AWD version;

    The extended-range version comes standard with a 52kWh battery, offering a pure electric range of 356km, a comprehensive range of 1270km, and supports 5C fast charging;

    Equipped with intelligent electric retractable rear spoiler and electronic exterior mirrors;

    Standard interior features include a 25-speaker Meridian sound system, a four-screen linkage system, and upgraded zero-gravity seats.

This launch simultaneously introduces limited-time car purchase benefits, with a total value of up to 43,760 yuan, including a lifetime warranty on the three core electric components, cash replacement subsidies, car usage gift packages, ADS advanced function package vouchers, and loan preferential policies. 此次上市同步推出限时购车权益，总价值最高可达 43760 元，包括终身三电质保、现金置换补贴、用车礼包、ADS 高阶功能包抵扣券以及贷款优惠政策。

Avatr stated that it will continue to deepen cooperation with Huawei and CATL in the future, planning to cumulatively launch 17 new models by 2030, covering market segments such as sedans, SUVs, MPVs, and sports cars. 阿维塔方面表示，未来将继续与华为、宁德时代深化合作，计划到 2030 年累计推出 17 款新车型，覆盖轿车、SUV、MPV、跑车等细分市场。

item.title: 16.99 万元起，smart 推出首款插混 SUV
item.guid: 16.99-万元起，smart-推出首款插混-SUV
item.description:
Yesterday, smart held a press conference in Hangzhou, officially launching its first plug-in hybrid SUV, the smart #5 EHD Super Electric Hybrid. 昨天，smart 在杭州召开发布会，旗下首款插电混动 SUV smart #5 EHD 超级电混正式上市。

At this press conference, smart stated that the model is jointly supported by Mercedes-Benz and Geely, integrating Mercedes-Benz's global design with Geely's hybrid technology, aiming to meet users' multi-scenario needs for urban commuting and long-distance travel. 此次发布会上，smart 表示该车型由奔驰与吉利共同支持，融合奔驰全球设计与吉利混动技术，旨在满足用户在城市通勤与长途出行中的多场景需求。

Key highlights of the new car: 新车主要亮点：

    Equipped with the latest generation Thor Electric Hybrid 2.0 system, with a CLTC comprehensive range of 1615 km;

    Engine thermal efficiency of 47.26%, fuel consumption at low battery charge of 4.4L/100km;

    Three-speed DHT seamless shifting;

    AMD five-screen intelligent cockpit, paired with smart Pilot Assist intelligent driving assistance system;

    Zero-gravity seats, 20-speaker Sennheiser sound system, Mercedes-Benz-style 256-color ambient lighting.

Tong Xiangbei, CEO of smart Global, stated at the press conference that the R&D investment for this model has "no upper limit, no cost consideration," aiming to provide users with a hybrid experience that balances luxury and technology. smart 全球公司 CEO 佟湘北在发布会上表示，该车型的研发投入「不设上限、不计成本」，目标是为用户提供兼顾豪华与技术的混动体验。

Regarding pricing, the new car is positioned in the luxury plug-in hybrid market under 200,000 yuan, with a limited-time starting price of 169,900 yuan, and is scheduled to begin national deliveries in mid-November. 售价方面，新车定位 20 万元以内的豪华插混市场，限时到手价 16.99 万元起，并计划于 11 月中旬开启全国交付。

item.title: DJI Pocket 4 机身照片流出，新按键曝光
item.guid: DJI-Pocket-4-机身照片流出，新按键曝光
item.description:
According to New Camera, the DJI Pocket 4 handheld gimbal camera has entered the mass production stage and is expected to be officially released within the next 2 to 3 months. 据 New Camera 报道，大疆 Pocket 4 手持云台相机已进入量产阶段，预计将在未来 2 至 3 个月内正式发布。

The latest leaked body photos show that while the device continues the Pocket 3's design language, it incorporates a new button layout, sparking speculation about its control methods and functional upgrades. 最新泄露的机身照片显示，该设备在延续 Pocket 3 设计语言的同时，加入了新的按键布局，引发外界对其操控方式和功能升级的猜测。

The news indicates that the Pocket 4 has undergone significant adjustments in both weight and size. The new machine weighs approximately 116g, about 35% lighter than its predecessor, making it more suitable for long-duration handheld shooting. The body height has increased by about 5 mm, but the width and thickness have been reduced by about 4 mm and 3.5 mm respectively, making the overall device slimmer and more portable. 消息指出，Pocket 4 在重量和尺寸上均有明显调整。新机重量约为 116g，比上代轻约 35%，更适合长时间手持拍摄。机身高度增加约 5 mm，但宽度和厚度分别缩减约 4 mm 和 3.5 mm，整体更为纤薄便携。

In terms of appearance, the Pocket 4 maintains a familiar grip, but the functions of the two new buttons have not yet been confirmed. 在外观方面，Pocket 4 保持了熟悉的握持手感，但新增的两个按键功能尚未确认。

Analysts believe this may be related to improved zoom capabilities. Testers previously revealed that the Pocket 4's zoom performance is significantly better than the Pocket 3. Meanwhile, the 2-inch rotatable screen is expected to be retained. 有分析认为，这可能与改进的变焦能力相关。此前测试者曾透露，Pocket 4 的变焦表现较 Pocket 3 有显著提升。与此同时，2 英寸可旋转屏幕预计将继续保留。

It is worth noting that the Pocket 4's body design had previously appeared in promotional shoots in Barcelona, which also sparked discussions about "new buttons" at the time. 值得注意的是，Pocket 4 的机身设计早前已在巴塞罗那的宣传拍摄中出现过，当时同样引发了关于「新按键」的讨论。

item.title: SCOOX 零际发布都市科技潮摩 X7
item.guid: SCOOX-零际发布都市科技潮摩-X7
item.description:
On October 28th, the new high-end two-wheel pure electric brand "SCOOX Lingji" released its first new-era urban tech-chic motorcycle, the "Land Airship" X7. 10 月 28 日，全新高端两轮纯电品牌「SCOOX 零际」发布首款新时代都市科技潮摩「陆地飞艇」X7。

As Lingji's pioneering work, the Lingji X7 earned the reputation of "Land Airship" during its warm-up phase, thanks to its forward-looking design language and excellent product positioning. 作为零际的开山之作，零际 X7 凭借其前瞻的设计语言与出色的产品定位，在预热阶段便收获「陆地飞艇」的美誉。

The new model draws design inspiration from the posture of a cheetah in pursuit and a futuristic vehicle, with smooth and powerful lines throughout, showcasing the characteristic of "elegance and wildness coexisting." 新车型以猎豹奔袭之姿和明日未来座驾为设计灵感，整车线条流畅且充满力量感，展现出「优雅与狂野并存」的特质。

To allow consumers to experience the extraordinary charm of the "Land Airship" as early as possible, Lingji announced that it will launch nationwide test drive events in December 2025, with official market launch and deliveries expected in the first quarter of 2026. 为了让消费者能尽早感受「陆地飞艇」的非凡魅力，零际宣布将于 2025 年 12 月启动全国试驾活动，并预计在 2026 年第一季度正式上市并开启交付。

item.title: AAC 瑞声科技发布多项自研方案，涵盖折叠、声学与散热
item.guid: AAC-瑞声科技发布多项自研方案，涵盖折叠、声学与散热
item.description:
Yesterday, AAC Technologies held the "AAC Technologies Perception Technology Summit" in Jiaxing, Zhejiang, where it unveiled multiple self-developed technical solutions covering areas such as foldable screens, acoustic modules, and cooling systems. 昨天，AAC 瑞声科技在浙江嘉兴召开了「AAC 瑞声科技感知技术峰会」，活动上集中发布了多项自研技术方案，涵盖折叠屏、声学模组及散热系统等领域。

In the cooling sector, AAC announced the completion of its first fully automated ultra-thin vapor chamber production line, which has already been applied to the iPhone 17 Pro series. 散热领域方面，瑞声宣布建成首条全自动化超薄均热板生产线，并已应用于 iPhone 17 Pro 系列。

The new generation of ultra-large area aluminum-copper composite VC vapor chambers measures 12050 mm², reducing weight by 9% while maintaining the same thickness, weighing only 9g. Additionally, AAC showcased an electromagnetic cooling fan based on an innovative electromagnetic architecture, representing its exploration in active cooling. 新一代超大面积铝铜复合 VC 均热板面积达 12050 mm²，在保持同等厚度的情况下减重 9%，重量仅为 9g。同时，瑞声还展示了基于创新电磁架构的电磁散热风扇，代表其在主动散热方向的探索。

At the conference, AAC also demonstrated an "automatic folding" solution, with the demo unit being a vertical small foldable form factor. This solution achieves automatic hinge opening and closing through electric drive, allowing users to complete the folding screen's opening and closing operations with one hand, and supports free hovering from 0-180°. 会上，瑞声还展示了「自动折叠」方案，演示机为竖向小折叠形态。该方案通过电动驱动实现铰链自动开合，用户可单手完成折叠屏的开合操作，并支持 0-180° 的自由悬停。

In terms of acoustics and modules, AAC released "Combo Ultra," which integrates a vibration motor and an acoustic sensor into one unit, maintaining a balance between vibration haptics and external sound quality under conditions of small size and high integration, while also freeing up internal space within the device. 在声学与模组方面，瑞声发布了「Combo Ultra」，将振动马达与声学传感器集成为一体，在小体积高集成的条件下保持振动手感与外放音质的平衡，同时释放机身内部空间。

Furthermore, AAC's WLG integrated optical solution has been applied to the telephoto modules of the Xiaomi 17 Pro and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max, with its imaging performance gaining market attention. 此外，瑞声的 WLG 一体成型光学方案已应用于小米 17 Pro 与小米 17 Pro Max 的长焦模组，成像效果获得市场关注。

This event also showcased several cutting-edge technologies, including optical microphones, coaxial speakers 2.0, ultra-small side-button motors, magnetic wireless charging modules, AR glasses optical engines, and triple-folding architectures. 本次活动还展示了光学麦克风、同轴扬声器 2.0、超小型侧键马达、磁吸无线充电模组、AR 眼镜光机、三折叠架构等多项前沿技术。

item.title: 元宝上线「一句话文件转换」功能，支持 Office、PDF 等格式
item.guid: 元宝上线「一句话文件转换」功能，支持-Office、PDF-等格式
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Yuanbao announced the launch of its "One-Sentence File Format Conversion" feature, allowing users to quickly convert various common document formats using natural language commands. 昨天，腾讯元宝宣布上线「一句话文件格式转换」功能，用户可通过自然语言指令完成多种常见文档格式的快速转换。

According to reports, this feature covers scenarios such as photo-to-document conversion, Word and PDF mutual conversion, CSV and Excel/JSON mutual conversion, and merging multiple PDF files. 据介绍，该功能覆盖拍照转文档、Word 与 PDF 互转、CSV 与 Excel、JSON 互转，以及多份 PDF 合并等场景。

Specifically, users only need to upload files to the Yuanbao App, web version, or desktop version, describe their needs in a single sentence, and then directly download the processed results. 具体来看，用户只需在元宝 App、网页版或电脑版上传文件，并以一句话描述需求，即可直接下载处理后的结果。

For example, after photographing a paper document, it can quickly generate Excel or PDF; Word documents can be converted to PDF with one click, avoiding layout errors; in data processing, CSV, Excel, and JSON files can be mutually converted; multiple PDF files can also be merged into a single file via voice or text commands. 例如，拍摄纸质文件后可快速生成 Excel 或 PDF；Word 文档可一键转为 PDF，并避免排版错乱；数据处理环节中，CSV、Excel、JSON 文件可相互转换；多份 PDF 文件也可通过语音或文字指令合并为单一文件。

item.title: 「飓风相机」上架 App Store
item.guid: 「飓风相机」上架-App-Store
item.description:
Yesterday, the "Hurricane Camera" App, independently developed by the Yingshi Jufeng team, officially launched on the Apple App Store. This application focuses on professional imaging features, aiming to provide mobile users with a shooting experience closer to professional equipment. 昨天，影视飓风团队自主研发的「飓风相机」App 正式上线苹果 App Store。这款应用主打专业影像功能，定位于为移动端用户提供更接近专业设备的拍摄体验。

Regarding core features, "Hurricane Camera" supports Apple Log video recording and allows real-time application of professional LUTs, achieving a "what you see is what you get" cinematic visual effect. Additionally, the app provides professional control options such as manual focus, exposure, and white balance, meeting creators' demands for detailed control. 在核心功能上，「飓风相机」支持 Apple Log 视频拍摄，并可实时套用专业 LUT，实现「所见即所得」的电影级画面效果。同时，应用提供手动对焦、曝光、白平衡等专业控制选项，满足创作者对细节的掌控需求。

Additionally, users can directly generate dynamic photos from color-graded videos and publish them to social media platforms using the one-click sharing feature. 此外，用户可通过一键分享功能，将调色完成的视频直接生成动态照片并发布至社交平台。

In terms of compatibility, "Hurricane Camera" supports iPhones running iOS 17.0 and above, with the Pro version priced at 69 yuan. 兼容性方面，「飓风相机」支持运行 iOS 17.0 及以上版本的 iPhone，Pro 版的价格为 69 元。

item.title: MiniMax 发布 Hailuo 2.3 视频模型与多模态智能体
item.guid: MiniMax-发布-Hailuo-2.3-视频模型与多模态智能体
item.description:
Yesterday, MiniMax Xiyu Technology officially released the video generation model Hailuo 2.3 and simultaneously launched the full-modal creation platform Media Agent. 昨天，MiniMax 稀宇科技正式发布视频生成模型 Hailuo 2.3，并同步推出全模态创作平台 Media Agent。

The new model achieves significant improvements in dynamic expressiveness, stylized support, and subtle facial expressions, while maintaining the same pricing strategy as its predecessor, Hailuo 02. 新模型在动态表现力、风格化支持以及人物微表情等方面实现显著提升，同时保持与前代 Hailuo 02 相同的定价策略。

According to reports, Hailuo 2.3 achieves near real-shot effects in body movement presentation, light and shadow transitions, and tone control, allowing for a more natural display of character performances and subtle expressions. The model also performs more stably and vividly in stylized scenes such as anime, illustrations, ink wash, and game CG. 据介绍，Hailuo 2.3 在肢体动作呈现、光影过渡和色调控制上接近实拍效果，能够更自然地展现人物表演与微表情。模型在动漫、插画、水墨和游戏 CG 等风格化场景中的表现也更为稳定和生动。

Additionally, Hailuo 2.3 optimizes both the response speed and accuracy to motion commands, making it suitable for high-frequency creation scenarios such as e-commerce advertising. 此外，Hailuo 2.3 对运动指令的响应速度和精确度均有优化，适用于电商广告等高频创作场景。

In terms of cost, Hailuo 2.3 sets a new record for the cost-effectiveness of global video models, with the introduced Hailuo 2.3 Fast model capable of reducing costs by up to 50% in batch creation. 在成本方面，Hailuo 2.3 刷新了全球视频模型的性价比纪录，推出的 Hailuo 2.3 Fast 模型可在批量创作中降低最高 50% 成本。

Meanwhile, MiniMax has upgraded Hailuo Video Agent, released this summer, to Media Agent. This platform supports full-modal creation, allowing users to input requirements via natural language, with the system automatically matching multi-modal models to achieve "one-click video generation." 与此同时，MiniMax 将今年夏季发布的 Hailuo Video Agent 升级为 Media Agent。该平台支持全模态创作，用户可通过自然语言输入需求，由系统自动匹配多模态模型，实现「一键成片」。

Currently, Hailuo 2.3 is fully launched on the Hailuo AI web client, App client, and open platform API, offering daily free trial quotas. 目前，Hailuo 2.3 已在海螺 AI 网页端、App 客户端及开放平台 API 全面上线，并提供每日免费试用额度。

Hailuo AI Experience Link: https://hailuoai.com/ 海螺 AI 体验链接： https://hailuoai.com/

Media Agent Experience Link: https://hailuoai.com/agent Media Agent 体验链接： https://hailuoai.com/agent

item.title: 全球首款单芯片舱驾一体方案落地
item.guid: 全球首款单芯片舱驾一体方案落地
item.description:
On October 28, the world's first mass-produced vehicle equipped with Qualcomm's SA8775P cockpit-driving integrated solution, the new ARCFOX Alpha T5, was officially launched. 10 月 28 日，全球首个搭载高通 SA8775P 舱驾一体方案的量产车型 —— 极狐全新阿尔法 T5 正式上市。

As a core technical partner of BAIC ARCFOX, ZOYU Technology, with the power of architectural innovation, is driving automotive intelligence from "separated cockpit and driving" to "integrated cockpit and driving," truly achieving "unified architecture and upgraded experience." 作为北汽极狐的核心技术合作伙伴，卓驭科技以架构革新之力，推动汽车智能从 「舱驾分立」 迈向 「舱驾一体」，真正实现 「架构统一、体验升级」。

The implementation of this cockpit-driving integrated solution marks the industry's first to achieve mapless end-to-end urban NOA based on a single-chip cockpit-driving integrated solution, and it delivers three key capabilities: 此次舱驾一体方案落地，是行业首个基于单芯片舱驾一体方案实现无图端到端城市 NOA，并且实现了三方面能力：

    Supports full-scenario intelligent assisted driving functions, covering mapless end-to-end urban navigation assistance and highway navigation assistance, automatic parking assistance, cross-floor memory parking, and other features.

    Benefiting from the direct interaction of cockpit and driving data, user operation response speed is significantly improved.

    Based on mass-produced sensors and the computing power+ solution, ZOYU will continuously upgrade models and algorithms to ensure the assisted driving system is "always new and frequently used," thereby continuously enhancing long-term user value.

item.title: 喜茶推出「heytea Halloween」节日限定活动
item.guid: 喜茶推出「heytea-Halloween」节日限定活动
item.description:
As the Halloween atmosphere intensifies, HEYTEA recently launched the "heytea Halloween" limited-time event, which will be available in select stores nationwide starting October 30. 随着万圣节气氛渐浓，喜茶近期推出「heytea Halloween」节日限定活动，将于 10 月 30 日起在全国部分门店上线。

Alongside the limited event, HEYTEA introduced two quirky merchandise items, echoing the Halloween atmosphere to bring unique holiday inspiration to consumers. These include: 伴随限定活动，喜茶推出两款搞怪周边，呼应万圣节氛围为消费者带来独特的节日灵感。其中：

    The "Cute Ghost" HEYTEA cup plush merchandise combines iconic elements such as pumpkins, ghosts, and bandaged mummies, designed in three styles: "Pumpkin Meow," "Xi Xiaoling," and "Cha Naiyi."

    The luminous card merchandise combines Heytea's succulent grape and other products with Tarot card elements, offering fortune interpretations based on the different flavors of three popular products, bringing new festive tea-drinking fun to consumers.

In overseas regions where Halloween is more popular, Heytea launched its collaborative product "WICKED MATCHA" with the Broadway musical "WICKED" earlier, on October 16th, in its overseas stores in the US, Canada, UK, and Singapore, sparking a widespread trend of check-ins. 在万圣节更为流行的海外地区，喜茶则于更早的 10 月 16 日，美国、加拿大、英国、新加坡各海外区域门店中，率先上线与百老汇音乐剧《魔法坏女巫（WICKED）》联动产品「WICKED MATCHA」，引发广泛打卡热潮。

This collaborative product was developed by combining the magical inspiration of the two main characters, Elphaba and Glinda, from "WICKED." It adds a touch of grapefruit-scented pink cloud topping to Heytea's globally popular Sencha Matcha, creating a striking pink and green color scheme and a magical fusion of matcha and fruit flavors, which quickly made this product popular on overseas social media platforms. 这款联动产品结合《魔法坏女巫》中 Elphaba、 Glinda 两位主角的魔法灵感进行研发，为喜茶今年全球热卖的千目抹茶加上了一抹柚香粉色云顶，粉与绿的冲击性配色，抹茶与果香的神奇碰撞，让这款产品迅速走红海外社交平台。

Not only did Heytea's overseas stores see long queues, but domestic consumers also expressed a strong desire to try it. 不仅喜茶各海外区域门店排起长队，国内消费者也纷纷表示想要尝鲜。

item.title: New Balance 再释「抹茶」主题，991v2 新配色即将登场
item.guid: New-Balance-再释「抹茶」主题，991v2-新配色即将登场
item.description:
Amsterdam designer Daniëlle Cathari has once again collaborated with New Balance to launch a new 991v2 "Reverse Matcha" colorway. 阿姆斯特丹设计师 Daniëlle Cathari 与 New Balance 再度合作，推出全新 991v2「Reverse Matcha」配色。

This version continues the theme of her first "Matcha Latte" inspired shoe, but with a reversed color scheme: the upper is covered in brown suede, paired with a matcha green mesh base, while the sole features a standard combination of white, khaki, and black. 这一版本延续其首款「抹茶拿铁」灵感鞋款的主题，但在配色上进行了反转处理：鞋面覆盖棕色麂皮，搭配抹茶绿色网布基底，鞋底则采用白色、卡其色与黑色的标准组合。

Cathari's first collaboration with New Balance in 2023, the 991v2 "Matcha," saw its secondary market price approach $1500 (approximately 10,650 RMB) due to extreme scarcity. This new release is expected to be exclusively available through Kith Women channels. Cathari 于 2023 年首次与 New Balance 合作推出的 991v2「Matcha」因极度稀缺而在二级市场价格一度接近 1500 美元（约 10650 元人民币）。此次新作预计将通过 Kith Women 渠道独家发售。

It is worth noting that Cathari resigned as Creative Director of Kith Women in October 2024, so the scale of this collaboration's release and its market reception are highly anticipated. 值得注意的是，Cathari 曾在 2024 年 10 月辞去 Kith Women 创意总监一职，因此本次合作的发售规模与市场反响备受关注。

item.title: CASETiFY 推出《魔卡少女樱》联名系列手机壳
item.guid: CASETiFY-推出《魔卡少女樱》联名系列手机壳
item.description:
Recently, CASETiFY announced a new collaboration series with the classic Japanese anime "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card Arc." Inspired by "Clear Cards," this series combines retro Y2K style with magical elements, launching several limited-edition electronic accessories. 近日，CASETiFY 宣布携手日本经典动画《魔卡少女樱：透明牌篇》推出全新联名系列。该系列以「透明牌」为灵感，将复古 Y2K 风格与魔法元素相结合，推出多款限定电子配件。

This collaborative series features pink as its main visual theme, incorporating iconic elements such as magic wands, the guardian beast Kero, and magic books. It aims to evoke fans' youthful memories and transform everyday electronic accessories into tangible "magic tools." 此次联名系列以粉色为主视觉，融入魔杖、守护兽小可、魔法书等标志性元素，旨在唤起粉丝的青春记忆，并将日常电子配件转化为具象化的「魔法道具」。

Among them, the personalized "Caller ID" phone case allows users to choose character interfaces such as Sakura, Syaoran, or Keroberos, connecting the call experience to the magical world. 其中，个性定制款「来电显示」手机壳允许用户选择小樱、小狼或可鲁贝洛斯等角色界面，让来电体验与魔法世界相连。

Additionally, the series includes magical phone lanyards featuring Clear Cards and Dream Wand charms, as well as a plush earphone pouch shaped like the guardian beast Kero. CASETiFY states that this series not only fulfills fans' collecting desires but also adds fun and vibrancy to daily use through its detailed design. 此外，系列还包括融入透明牌与梦之杖坠饰的魔法手机挂链，以及守护兽小可造型的毛绒耳机收纳袋。CASETiFY 表示，该系列不仅满足粉丝的收藏需求，也通过细节设计为日常使用增添趣味与灵动感。

item.title: 小米汽车发布纽北纪录片《6’22”091》
item.guid: 小米汽车发布纽北纪录片《6’22”091》
item.description:
Yesterday, Lei Jun, Chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Group, posted on Weibo to announce the Xiaomi Auto "Conquering Nürburgring Nordschleife Documentary" titled "6’22”091," commemorating the first anniversary of its officially certified lap time on the Nürburgring Nordschleife circuit. The full film is 1 hour and 9 minutes long. 昨天，小米集团董事长、CEO 雷军在微博发文，宣布小米汽车「征战纽北纪录片」《6’22”091》，以纪念其在纽博格林北环赛道获得官方认证圈速成绩一周年，全片长 1 小时 9 分钟。

On October 28, 2024, Xiaomi Auto first achieved this result, and yesterday marked exactly one year since then. The film fully reviews Xiaomi Auto's challenge process on the Nürburgring Nordschleife and expresses gratitude to users who have long followed and supported the progress of China's automotive industry. 2024 年 10 月 28 日，小米汽车首次取得该成绩，到昨日正好满一年。影片完整回顾了小米汽车在纽北赛道的挑战过程，并向长期关注和支持中国汽车工业进步的用户表达谢意。

The Nürburgring Nordschleife is considered one of the world's most demanding performance testing grounds, and lap times are often used as a crucial indicator of automotive performance. 纽北赛道被视为全球最严苛的性能测试场之一，圈速成绩常被用作衡量汽车性能的重要指标。

item.title: 《疯狂动物城 2》中文预告公布
item.guid: 《疯狂动物城-2》中文预告公布
item.description:
Yesterday, Disney officially released the latest Chinese trailer for "Zootopia 2," showcasing new scenes like the Wetland Market and the Fire Beast Festival, and revealing the debut of a new character, "Gary the Snake." Voiced by Oscar winner Ke Huy Quan, this character carries a secret family mission, stirring up trouble during Zootopia's centennial celebration. 昨日，迪士尼官方发布了《疯狂动物城 2》的最新中文预告片，展示了湿地市场、火兽节等新场景，并揭示了新角色「蛇盖瑞」的登场。该角色由奥斯卡奖得主关继威配音，肩负家族秘密使命，在动物城百年庆典中引发波澜。

"Zootopia 2" is confirmed to be released simultaneously in mainland China and North America on November 26. The film continues the previous story, with Officer Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde once again teaming up to confront Zootopia's deep-seated secrets and face new challenges. 《疯狂动物城 2》已确认将于 11 月 26 日在中国内地与北美同步上映。影片延续前作剧情，兔警官朱迪与狐尼克再度携手，直面动物城深藏的秘密，并迎来全新挑战。

According to "Southern Daily," since its release in 2016, the "Zootopia" series has grossed $1.02 billion worldwide and 1.53 billion RMB in mainland China, remaining the highest-grossing imported animated film to date. In August this year, the film was re-released as a 4K HDR restored version, with an end-credit scene added to connect to the sequel. 据《南方日报》报道，《疯狂动物城》系列自 2016 年上映以来，全球票房达 10.2 亿美元，中国内地票房 15.3 亿元人民币，至今仍为进口动画电影票房冠军。今年 8 月，该片曾以 4K HDR 修复版重映，并在片尾加入衔接续集的彩蛋。

item.title: 《过关斩将：猎杀游戏》北美档期推迟
item.guid: 《过关斩将：猎杀游戏》北美档期推迟
item.description:
The release of the sci-fi action thriller "The Running Man: Hunting Game," adapted from Stephen King's novel and directed by Edgar Wright, has been postponed by one week, shifting from its original North American release date of November 7 to November 14. The filmmakers plan to secure more IMAX screenings. 斯蒂芬·金小说改编、埃德加·赖特执导的科幻动作惊悚片《过关斩将：猎杀游戏》档期推迟一周，由原定的 11 月 7 日北美上映调整至 11 月 14 日，片方计划争取更多 IMAX 场次。

The film's story centers on a reality show called "The Running Man," where contestants must evade "hunters" for 30 days to win a massive cash prize if they survive. The film's protagonist, Ben Richards, chooses to participate in this high-stakes competition, and the plot revolves around his survival challenge. 影片故事聚焦一档名为《过关斩将》的真人秀节目：参赛者需在 30 天内逃避「猎人」追杀，若能存活即可获得巨额奖金。影片男主角本·理查兹选择参加这场高风险竞赛，剧情围绕其生存挑战展开。

item.title: 《象山发光事件》北京首映
item.guid: 《象山发光事件》北京首映
item.description:
The thriller and suspense film "Xiangshan Glowing Incident" held its premiere in Beijing on the 27th. 惊悚悬疑电影《象山发光事件》于 27 日在北京举行首映礼。

Director and screenwriter Zhao Yu, producer Chang Lei, lead actor Xiao Shenyang, and several other principal creators attended the event and discussed behind-the-scenes details with the audience. The film, shot in a found-footage style, will be released nationwide on October 31st and is currently available for pre-sale. 导演编剧赵域、监制常雷、领衔主演小沈阳及多位主创出席活动，并与观众交流影片幕后细节。影片采用伪纪录片手法拍摄，将于 10 月 31 日在全国上映，目前已开启预售。

The premiere was themed "Do Not Approach the Light Source," and guests included veteran filmmaker Shen Kemin, agent Xu Ziyue, and iQiyi producer Tan Nanlan. 首映礼以「勿近光源」为主题，现场嘉宾包括资深电影人沈克敏、经纪人徐子玥及爱奇艺制片人覃楠岚。

In this film, Xiao Shenyang challenges the horror genre for the first time, breaking away from his usual comedic image to play a character who delves into forbidden areas to uncover the truth. Director Zhao Yu stated that Xiao Shenyang's performance was subtle and full of contrast, to the point where he was almost unrecognizable on set. 本片中，小沈阳首次挑战惊悚题材，突破以往喜剧形象，在片中饰演深入禁地探寻真相的角色。导演赵域表示，小沈阳的表演细腻且极具反差，甚至在现场让人一度认不出其身份。

The element of "light source equals danger" in the film's setting left a deep impression on the audience, with some viewers explicitly stating they were "afraid of light sources" after watching. The director revealed that the film's ending deliberately maintains suspense, hoping that audiences will still experience a "chilling realization" after leaving the cinema. 影片设定中「光源即危险」的元素让观众印象深刻，部分观众在观影后直言「害怕光源」。导演透露，影片结局刻意保留悬念，希望观众在走出影院后仍能产生「细思极恐」的回味。
